verses.verse: שִׁ֖יר <WH7892> A Song מִזְמ֣וֹר <WH4210> [or] Psalm לְאָסָֽף׃ <WH623> of Asaph אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> O God אַל־ <WH408> not דֳּמִי־ <WH1824> Keep not thou silence לָ֑ךְ אַל־ <WH408> not תֶּחֱרַ֖שׁ <WH2790> hold not thy peace וְאַל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׁקֹ֣ט <WH8252> and be not still אֵֽל׃ <WH410> O God

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold א֭וֹיְבֶיךָ <WH341> For lo thine enemies יֶהֱמָי֑וּן <WH1993> make a tumult וּ֝מְשַׂנְאֶ֗יךָ <WH8130> and they that hate נָ֣שְׂאוּ <WH5375> thee have lifted up רֹֽאשׁ׃ <WH7218> the head

עַֽל־ <WH5921> against עַ֭מְּךָ <WH5971> against thy people יַעֲרִ֣ימוּ <WH6191> They have taken crafty ס֑וֹד <WH5475> counsel וְ֝יִתְיָעֲצ֗וּ <WH3289> and consulted עַל־ <WH5921> against צְפוּנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6845> against thy hidden ones

אָמְר֗וּ <WH559> They have said לְ֭כוּ <WH1980> Come וְנַכְחִידֵ֣ם <WH3582> and let us cut them off מִגּ֑וֹי <WH1471> from [being] a nation וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יִזָּכֵ֖ר <WH2142> may be no more in remembrance שֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> that the name יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> of Israel עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> more

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for נוֹעֲצ֣וּ <WH3289> For they have consulted לֵ֣ב <WH3820> with one consent יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> together עָ֝לֶ֗יךָ <WH5921> Against בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> confederate יִכְרֹֽתוּ׃ <WH3772> they are
אָהֳלֵ֣י <WH168> The tabernacles אֱ֭דוֹם <WH123> of Edom וְיִשְׁמְעֵאלִ֗ים <WH3459> and the Ishmaelites מוֹאָ֥ב <WH4124> of Moab וְהַגְרִֽים׃ <WH1905> and the Hagarenes

גְּבָ֣ל <WH1381> Gebal וְ֭עַמּוֹן <WH5983> and Ammon וַעֲמָלֵ֑ק <WH6002> and Amalek פְּ֝לֶ֗שֶׁת <WH6429> the Philistines עִם־ <WH5973> with יֹ֥שְׁבֵי <WH3427> with the inhabitants צֽוֹר׃ <WH6865> of Tyre

גַּם־ <WH1571> also אַ֭שּׁוּר <WH804> Assur נִלְוָ֣ה <WH3867> also is joined עִמָּ֑ם <WH5973> They הָ֤י֥וּ <WH1961> have זְר֖וֹעַ <WH2220> with them they have holpen לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> the children ל֣וֹט <WH3876> of Lot סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

עֲשֵֽׂה־ <WH6213> Do לָהֶ֥ם <WH1992> with כְּמִדְיָ֑ן <WH4080> unto them as [unto] the Midianites כְּֽסִֽיסְרָ֥א <WH5516> as [to] Sisera כְ֝יָבִ֗ין <WH2985> as [to] Jabin בְּנַ֣חַל <WH5158> at the brook קִישֽׁוֹן׃ <WH7028> of Kison
נִשְׁמְד֥וּ <WH8045> [Which] perished בְֽעֵין־ דֹּ֑אר <WH5874> at Endor הָ֥יוּ <WH1961> became דֹּ֝֗מֶן <WH1828> they became [as] dung לָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> for the earth

שִׁיתֵ֣מוֹ <WH7896> Make נְ֭דִיבֵמוֹ <WH5081> their nobles כְּעֹרֵ֣ב <WH6159> like Oreb וְכִזְאֵ֑ב <WH2062> and like Zeeb וּֽכְזֶ֥בַח <WH2078> as Zebah וּ֝כְצַלְמֻנָּ֗ע <WH6759> and as Zalmunna כָּל־ <WH3605> and all נְסִיכֵֽמוֹ׃ <WH5257> yea all their princes
אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> Who אָ֭מְרוּ <WH559> Who said נִ֣ירֲשָׁה <WH3423> in possession לָּ֑נוּ אֵ֝֗ת <WH853> נְא֣וֹת <WH4999> Let us take to ourselves the houses אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God
אֱ‍ֽלֹהַ֗י <WH430> O my God שִׁיתֵ֥מוֹ <WH7896> make כַגַּלְגַּ֑ל <WH1534> them like a wheel כְּ֝קַ֗שׁ <WH7179> as the stubble לִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> before רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> the wind
כְּאֵ֥שׁ <WH784> As the fire תִּבְעַר־ <WH1197> burneth יָ֑עַר <WH3293> a wood וּ֝כְלֶהָבָ֗ה <WH3852> and as the flame תְּלַהֵ֥ט <WH3857> on fire הָרִֽים׃ <WH2022> the mountains
כֵּ֭ן <WH3651> So תִּרְדְּפֵ֣ם <WH7291> So persecute בְּסַעֲרֶ֑ךָ <WH5591> them with thy tempest וּבְסוּפָתְךָ֥ <WH5492> with thy storm תְבַהֲלֵֽם׃ <WH926> and make them afraid
מַלֵּ֣א <WH4390> Fill פְנֵיהֶ֣ם <WH6440> their faces קָל֑וֹן <WH7036> with shame וִֽיבַקְשׁ֖וּ <WH1245> that they may seek שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> thy name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> O LORD

יֵבֹ֖שׁוּ <WH954> Let them be confounded וְיִבָּהֲל֥וּ <WH926> and troubled עֲדֵי־ <WH5703> for ever עַ֗ד <WH5704> and let וְֽיַחְפְּר֥וּ <WH2659> yea let them be put to shame וְיֹאבֵֽדוּ׃ <WH6> and perish

וְֽיֵדְע֗וּ <WH3045> That [men] may know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֬ה <WH859> whose שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> that thou whose name יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> alone [is] JEHOVAH לְבַדֶּ֑ךָ <WH905> you alone עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <WH5945> [art] the most high עַל־ <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> over all the earth
